text: KH BESA Famgas is a team handball club from Peja in western Kosovo. KH BESA Famgas competes in the Superliga Meshkujt and the Kosovo Handball Cup, and it is one of the most famous handball clubs with traditional titles and champions . == Titles == *Superliga (Record): **Winners (17): 1961, 1991, 1996, 1997, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2012, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 *Kosovo Cup (Record): **Winners (11): 1996, 2003, 2005, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
